website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a space-saving model, consider this 3.2-cup blender. Keep in mind, though, you may need to pre-cut larger vegetables so they can fit in the bowl for chopping.
pros: Airtight cap is waterproof and dustproof
Comes with egg separator and stirring blades
cons: Smaller bowl means you may need to pre-chop larger vegetables

customer_reviews.title: Second one I have bought
customer_reviews.text: I have a kitchen full of gadgets so its crazy that the one I use the most is this inexpensive little gizmo. I cook most days and it chops so well because it does not reduce the onion etc to a pulp like my food processor does. I can fine chop a large onion in 10 seconds and its so easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy food chopper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for quick chopping of garlic, parsley & green onions. This works perfectly for what I need. It’s easy to assemble, easy to use and easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: peanutkristy

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I used a similar product at a cousin's home and wanted one like hers. I saw this online and ordered it, thinking it would work as hers did. Unfortunately, this one is very soft plastic and when I put items in it to mix up a recipe, the handle wouldn't even turn before I heard the plastic beginning to crack. About the only thing that can be stirred well in this thing, is boiled eggs and soft tuna. I am so disappointed. If you try to mix up veggies that are too hard, I am not sure it will hold up for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kaysette

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!!
customer_reviews.text: I own a few other manual choppers and I have to say that this one is my favorite. The other ones use a string and you pill it. This has a nice handle, the baldes at very sharp and it is very big. I can also mix and do a lot more with this model I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy Taborda

customer_reviews.title: Ease of chopping
customer_reviews.text: Great product for ease of chopping vegetables. Cuts a LOT of time out of preparing for meal preparation. Only drawback is it's a little unstable when trying to crank the handle, but overall, it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: It is a good value for the dollar.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, just hate that it’s not dishwasher safe. It cuts very fine or in chunks. I especially love the way it chops up celery without leaving strings. You have to be very careful when manually cleaning the blades because they are very sharp, although I’ve put them in the dishwasher with no problem. You just can’t put the base in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: L. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Life so much easier with this chopper.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this chopper for a family member that does a lot of cooking. He already had one but the old types only had two blades. He loves the easiness of chopping with this new chopper. Easier to turn and has three very sharp blades. Going to buy myself one. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jodeelee

customer_reviews.title: Used wrong screws to hold together
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product until the screws holding the lid and blade on, started to rust. This is an item that comes into contact with food, and they should have used stainless steel. Will be trying to replace with another brand because of, I cannot afford to poison my husband and myself with something that incorporates rust into the food.
customer_reviews.author: anokienurse

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It works very well, chopped onion and peppers very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good works well.
customer_reviews.text: Instead of using power you can use your body power. Eco friendly.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Easy but had flaws
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and does it job for the most part. The handle doesn't stay on when you lift it at 8 or less friend. Also the cap for the poor doesn't stay on. Eggs or fluid leaks out.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It works, but it's cheap. There are others better made.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp. Cuts great need to reduce amount in bowl when doing things like carrots or celery Not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.author: linda seyl

customer_reviews.title: good job
customer_reviews.text: I no longer need to be as busy as before. This makes my kitchen simple
customer_reviews.author: Berton jin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap made not sturdy parts to not snap together and fold got broken holding candle
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a photo because after I put in a pressure washer and a connected all the pieces and everything snap-together I grabbed it as going to put on the Shelf I grabbed by the handle the handle came off I was holding the head with my hand and it was broken a few different pieces so it's in the trash now it's a piece of garbage that's for sure I'll never buy one like that again their product is not made very good at all
customer_reviews.author: Dennis E. Kell

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for !
customer_reviews.text: It's inexpensive for a reason. The handle is held in place by a couple of small bumps and continually disconnects when being used. Trying to cut anything even slightly hard bends the crank handle and it feels like applying more pressure will snap it. Works OK on soft greens but anything tougher is a struggle. It functions as you might expect for something in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: A Good Small Job Device
customer_reviews.text: The material, construction, and design of the device made me uncomfortable using a lot of force with it. It's plastic, but it's not very sturdy. It worked, but I felt tentative when using it and was very cautious. I wouldn't feel confident depending on it.
customer_reviews.author: Just A Thot

customer_reviews.title: GREAT  CHOPPER
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great item to have. Saves time and so easy to use! I actually like it better than my food processor for chopping vegetables 🍅,🌶, onions, even nuts and lots more.
customer_reviews.author: Gordy

customer_reviews.title: I dislike when you turn to cut items it skips
customer_reviews.text: I dislike when you turn to cut items it skips
customer_reviews.author: diana munoz

customer_reviews.title: best money ever spent
customer_reviews.text: I had mines for 2 years purchased at bjs one day they where doing a demo and i tell you its easy to use easy to clean and so sturdy i woudnt change it for the one with the rope pulling because for me I s easier to use but also i love how big it is.
customer_reviews.author: eridania

product_meta.title: Tenta Kitchen 3.2-Cup/800ml Hand Crank Food Processor/Manual Food Chopper/Meat Grinder/Vegetable Dicer And Mincer/Fruit Blender With Egg Separator …
feature_bullets: Every componets of this meat blender/vegetable mincer is made of heavy duty and food grade material which keeps long time and safe to use.
Large volume(800ml)is large enough to chop purple cabage,tomato,spicy,carrot also to grind meat, garlic,gringer and egg.

This hand crank food mincer has a non-slip suction base making you swing the crank more easily.Airtight cap can keep the food materials in container clean and fresh cause it's waterproof and dustproof.
Good grip hand crank and easy usage method will give you am amazing experience when you doing some DIY food or vegetable salad,fruit juice and minced meat.
This manual food chopper can be taken apart for cleaning and smooth apperance is easy to clean and won't leave too much dust or mess.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars137 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
